trends: There have been 185 other sightings in Denver
There were no other sightings in Denver on or around August 5th 2009
Summary: Observed light in cloud while walking around the bike path in park at night.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was walking around City of Potenza park , as I was walking I looked up and observed the light sitting just under a small cloud , kept walking then looked up again and the outside edges shrunk inward and then it disappeared . At first I thought it was a helicopter , but I didn't hear any noise . The feeling I had of the object was that it seemed at first a common thing , but then it seemed kind of odd and out of place . I lost sight of the object as the outside edges of the light shrunk inward and disappeared . It was a round light with sharp defined edges and kind of a dull shade , the light was not bright and it didn't shine down to the ground , it was just kind of THERE .
